Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Embolism and Thrombosis/Thromboembolism/Intracranial Embolism and Thrombosis/Carotid Artery Thrombosis
Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Cerebrovascular Disorders/Carotid Artery Diseases/Carotid Artery Thrombosis
Record.Description: Blood clot formation in any part of the CAROTID ARTERIES. This may produce CAROTID STENOSIS or occlusion of the vessel, leading to TRANSIENT ISCHEMIC ATTACK; CEREBRAL INFARCTION; or AMAUROSIS FUGAX.
